document.full_text: a u.s. border patrol agent who was arrested last week with hundreds of pounds of marijuana in his truck has been charged with drug trafficking offenses, authorities said on tuesday.
document.title: border patrol agent indicted for marijuana trafficking
lines_and_colors: a u.s. border patrol agent who was arrested last week with hundreds of pounds of marijuana in his truck has been charged with drug trafficking offenses, authorities said on tuesday.
